pr_title: fix(TBD-11675):DataProc Spark Hive Job fails with error java.lang.NoSuchMethodException

timeline.message: fix(TBD-11675):DataProc Spark Hive Job fails with error java.lang.NoSuchMethodException

timeline.bodyText: should this stay as org.talend.libraries or org.apache.spark ?
timeline.author: AlixMetivier

replies.bodyText: Goal is to move to official group as we don't need to stay in org.talend.libraries even if we still need to upload the jars to our Nexus with our minimal poms. At least it will be clearer for us and jars can be fetch easily by our Python tooling.
replies.author: lbourgeois

replies.bodyText: then why not org.apache.spark here ? Or maybe i don't get your point !
replies.author: AlixMetivier

replies.bodyText: Ok got it you were refering to this particular one. Seems a miss, will modify thanks
replies.author: lbourgeois

timeline.message: Merge branch 'lbourgeois/tbd11675' of github.com:Talend/tbd-studio-se into lbourgeois/tbd11675

timeline.bodyText:
@lbourgeois question about this lib.
As I see there is no jar on maven central repo:
https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.apache.thrift/libfb303/0.9.3
But it is still on nexus:
https://talend-update.talend.com/nexus/content/repositories/libraries/org/talend/libraries/libfb303-0.9.3/6.0.0/
Maybe it is worth to keep it as it was before?
timeline.author: sponomarova
timeline.diffHunk:

replies.bodyText:
Strange thing is that it can be found from https://search.maven.org/artifact/org.apache.thrift/libfb303/0.9.3/pom
along with associated jar https://repo1.maven.org/maven2/org/apache/thrift/libfb303/0.9.3/libfb303-0.9.3.jar
replies.author: lbourgeois

replies.bodyText: Also this jar is already available on our Nexus : https://talend-update.talend.com/nexus/service/local/repositories/libraries/content/org/apache/thrift/libfb303/0.9.3/libfb303-0.9.3.jar
replies.author: lbourgeois
